headline: Will the U.S. be self-sufficient in analog semi?
summary: Investing.com -- With the potential introduction of section 232 tariffs, Bernstein has analyzed the U.S. supply and demand balance in analog and discrete semiconductors, focusing on the implications for major players including Texas Instruments (NASDAQ:TXN), Analog Devices (NASDAQ:ADI), Infineon (OTC:IFNNY) Technologies (ETR:IFXGn), and Renesas (TYO:6723).
